Inline code: f(x) = x^2 + 1

Block code: 

function f(x)
  x^2 + 1
end

Inline AsciiMath 1: [[ f(x) = theta_0 + theta_1 x ]]

Inline AsciiMath 2: ` f(x) = theta_0 + theta_1 x `

Block AsciiMath (simple new line):

[[ f(x) = theta_0 + theta_1 x ]]

Inline LaTeX: $f(x) = \theta_0 + \theta_1 x$
